bug.author: squirrelsc
bug.description: Below commit is hit twice in upgrading, it should be fixed in v0.10 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/commit/c275ca684bbefa84ed2ee718a9996ebddc10ad7f>c275ca6</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This item is marked as a known issue on v0.10.1, a hotfix will be provided by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mzmssg>@mzmssg</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/scarlett2018>@scarlett2018</denchmark-link> will update the v0.10.1 release note with the hotfix accordingly. And the formal fix has been merged to v0.11.
I submited a hotfix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/pull/2441>#2441</denchmark-link> to , then user could apply these patches with
